ğŸš€Discover the latest additions to the Microsoft Flight Simulator marketplace this week and at the flying experience. This week it is military week with the A10-C Thunderbolt, Mig 1.44 and Tiger which have landed in the marketplace. In addition to that the OH-6 CAYUSE helicopter is now available in MSFS 2024. In addition to that multiple livery packs for the A320 and A321 have landed so you can now use liveries from multiple world airliners in MSFS 2024.. Whether you are experienced pilot or an aviation enthusiast, this is essential. Remember to like, comment and for additional Microsoft Flight content. ğŸŒğŸ›«
